summary: A mod consisting of 4 new and completely different classed followers.
descriptionHtml:
----Description----

This is my third mod on the nexus, I hope you all like it. I\'ve always wanted a group of followers that could work together to take down powerful foes, but could never quite find what I was looking for.
I wanted to be able to in a way make my Skyrim companion experience... unique. Instead of a group with a bunch of melee, archer, or mages; I wanted to make ONE group with at least one of each, and I came up with this.

Gruul - Orc - Melee Tank
Avaline - Wood Elf - Ranged DPS (hunter)
          Shiela - Bear - Melee Off-Tank / DPS
Paladin Clesa - Redguard - Melee DPS
Gaius - Breton - Mage DPS

----Quick Tip----

IF you don\'t want to use a follower. I have made them all in their own separate ESPs. So if you don\'t want one of them in your game. Just unclick the ESP and you\'re done. :)

----Side Note----
 
Their locations are just temporary. I will change them possibly into their own shack which I may also turn into a player home, however I have to learn the creation kit more.
author: DragonCourier
